citation.title: Austrian Foreign Policy in Historical Context

wikipedia.title: Greater Albania
wikipedia.summary: Greater Albania is an irredentist concept of lands that are considered to form the national homeland by many Albanians, based on claims on the present-day or historical presence of Albanian populations in those areas.

wikipedia.title: Albanian nationalism (Albania)
wikipedia.summary: Albanian nationalism in Albania is a general grouping of nationalist ideas and concepts generated by ethnic Albanians that were first formed in the 19th century during the Albanian National Awakening.

wikipedia.title: Albanian nationalism in Albania
wikipedia.summary: Albanian nationalism is a general grouping of nationalist ideas and concepts generated by ethnic Albanians that were first formed in the 19th century during the Albanian National Awakening .
